mapper.select: select board_bno, board_title, board_content, board_writer, board_regDate, board_viewCnt from member_board
mapper.insert: insert into member_board(board_title, board_content, board_writer) values(#{board_title}, #{board_content}, #{board_writer})
mapper.select: select board_bno, board_title, board_writer, board_regDate, board_viewCnt from member_board order by board_bno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select board_bno, board_title, board_writer, board_regDate, board_viewCnt from member_board
where board_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where board_content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where board_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or board_content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where board_writer LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by board_bno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select count(board_bno) from member_board
WHERE board_title LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE board_content LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
